title: RBI retains India's GDP growth forecast for current fiscal at 6.5% amid geopolitical tensions
description:
RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra on Friday estimated the country's real GDP growth at 6.5 per cent for the fiscal year 2025-26. Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra makes a statement on RBI Monetary Policy.(ANI )

Malhotra made the prediction while announcing the RBI's bimonthly monetary...
